EmailTemplate.name: Request GTA Connection
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
I have been assigned your TriTech service request ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}. I'll be happy to help you with this ticket. I would like to remotely connect with you. At your earliest convenience, please establish a GoToAssist session with me by selecting the following website: http://www.gotoassist.com/ph/tritech1. Once on the web page, enter your name, Agency, and select my name, {!Case.OwnerFullName}, from the representative list.
If you are unable to connect or have questions, feel free to call me at 1-800-987-0911 opt 2.
I look forward to working with you on this issue.
Thank you in advance,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
